ingredients.raw: 1 ounce dried porcini or cepe mushrooms
1 1/2 cups diced yellow onion or a combination of chopped onions and shallots (I used 1 cup onion, 1/2 cup shallots)

expected.item: diced yellow onion or a combination of chopped onions and shallots

ingredients.raw: Coarse salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste

expected.item: Coarse salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste

ingredients.raw: 1 1/2 pounds mixed fresh mushrooms, any tough stems discarded and roughly chopped

expected.note: any tough stems discarded and roughly chopped

ingredients.raw: 1 teaspoon fresh thyme leaves (use half if dry)

expected.item: fresh thyme leaves (use half if dry)

ingredients.raw: 1/4 cup Madeira, Marsala or sherry, or 1/2 cup white wine

expected.item: Madeira, Marsala or sherry, or 1/2 cup white wine

ingredients.raw: Crackers or matzo, sieved hard-boiled egg, chopped flat-leaf parsley and/or chives, small pickles or cornichons, additional caramelized onions or pickled shallots or red onions (recipe below)

expected.item: Crackers or matzo, sieved hard-boiled egg, chopped flat-leaf parsley and/or chives, small pickles or cornichons, additional caramelized onions or pickled shallots or red onions (recipe below)
